data.title: Football Law 2023 - Player Contracts, Agents, Tax And The Business Of Football
data.meta_description: The latest sports law conferences and events.
data.text:
The 2023 Football Law Conference (6th Edition) will provide one full day of panel discussions and presentations, two evenings of networking opportunities and a workshop on player agency and tax. The conference provides a professional forum to meet and develop meaningful relationships with colleagues working in the sector. This year's event is being held in Manchester.

Who Should Attend

Sports executives and administrators (Club Secretaries, CEOs, CFOs, Directors, etc)

In-house counsel working at clubs, federations, sponsors, media companies, agencies

Private practice lawyers

Agents

Topics & Agenda

Player agents and tax - avoiding pitfalls and sharing best practice

Commercial developments - fan engagement, sponsorship and media rights

Key cases and regulatory update

How approaches to risk management can help football clubs

Women’s football - Managing the challenges that come with growth

Financial Regulation and Independent Regulator

Dealing with bad behaviour in football - on and off the pitch

Coaches' and players' contracts - key developments and issues

Multi-Club Ownership - the future of football?

Day 1 - 21 May 2023

14:00 - 20:00 - Drinks Reception and Networking

Screening of Manchester City FC v Chelsea FC from 16:00 to 18:00.

Dress code: causal.

Day 2 - 22 May 2023

Dress code: Business/Business Causal

Morning (08:30 - 14:30)

09:25 – 09:30 - Welcome speech

Ciaran Fitzgerald-Morgan, Senior Legal Counsel - Media Rights, TEAM Marketing

George Pennington, Senior Lawyer at Legends, and former Head of Legal at Watford FC

15:50 - 16:10 - Coffee break

16:20 - 17:00 - Dealing with bad behaviour in football - on and off the pitch

Prof. Geoff Pearson, Professor of Law, University of Manchester Law School

Ifeanyi Odogwu, Barrister, Matrix Chambers (Moderator)

17:00 - 17:25 - Refreshments and networking

17:25 - 18:10 - Financial Regulation and Independent Regulator

Kieran Maguire, Football Finance Lecturer, University of Liverpool

Chris Anderson, experienced Football Lawyer and GC, and Former Head of the Football Governance Review

Adam Crockett, Head of Football Regulation Policy, Department of Culture, Media & Sport

18:20 – 21:00 Drinks reception

Tickets

There is a limited number of tickets, therefore they are being sold on a first come first served basis.

Ticket Type Standard

Price (£)

Plus/Academic/Corporate/ Member Price (£)

Private Practice

596

496 In-House/Academic

376*

276* Full-Time - Students

176

126

Please register for a Standard or Plus account and login when you are purchasing your ticket to ensure you can watch the video recordings and you receive the correct ticket.

*To purchase an in-house/academic ticket please email This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

** To be eligible for a student ticket you must be a full-time student before and at the time of the conference. If you purchase a student ticket when you are not a Full-Time Student (i.e. a working student) you will be prevented from entering the conference until the balance is paid and your membership may be revoked. To purchase a student ticket, please email events@lawinsport with a copy of your student card and certificate/letter of attendance to receive the discount code.

Full-Time Current & Former Athlete & Esports Players/Managers/Coaches = FREE.

If you represent your country at the Olympics and Paralympics or you are a full-time professional athlete, manager or coach, please email This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. with your details about the club or country you currently represent. If you are currently working in the professional services sector or you are in an executive position for a sports organisation, you will not be eligible for a free ticket.

Each attendee only needs to register once for the Conference and they will receive registration details in advance of the event. Discounts are applied automatically during the registration and checkout. Please note that all tickets are non-refundable.

Academic Membership Bulk Tickets - Our academic member institutions can receive a further discount on bulk tickets for their students. Please email This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. for more details.

In the unlikely event that the British Government introduces new restrictions that require the conference to be postponed, tickets will be carried forward to the date of the rescheduled conference.

Further Discounts

As with all LawInSport's activities, we set the price to be as inclusive as possible. A full price ticket equates to less than 1 hour of billable time for the majority of lawyers around the world. For students it is less than the price of a couple of cups of coffee for each session, and is less than 5% of the cost of many online courses. Therefore, we hope you will understand why we do not offer any additional discounts.

Professional Development

The conference offers 6 hours of self-accredited CPD.

Sponsors

Venue Sponsor - OmniSports

Venue & Travel Arrangements

OmniSports, (The Gallery) 3 Archway, Hulme, Manchester M15 5QJ.

Travel Arrangements:

10 minutes by taxi from Manchester Piccadilly Train Station.

18 minutes from Manchester Airport.

Coach service (only on Monday 22 May):

In the morning two coaches will collect attendees from Manchester Piccadilly and take them to the conference venue, leaving at 8:55 & 9:25

In the evening there will be two coaches collecting attendees from the conference venue to Manchester Piccadilly at 19:00 and 20:00.

You can register for this service, which is on a first come first served basis, here.

The bus will be a white, unbranded bus collecting attendees from Piccadilly at the bus stop on Fairfield street. There will also be members of the LawInSport team there so please keep an eye out for them.

The license plate of the coach is LF71DKY.
